string.text: Hatch
I followed the stalker as he was going to his stash. I'll check it out sooner or later.
Heaps of pipes
I squeezed some info out of a sucker on a stash of his. He and his pal are hiding all kinds of stuff there. Riches, here I come!
Ravine near outpost
This one chump was taking a whiz in the bushes. Didn't notice when I made it off with his backpack. Think I'll hide it for some time.
Dropped backpack
Can't make it off with this wound... Gotta let go of the stuff...
Cross near stones
Perfect spot for a stash: a remote cross in high radiation.
Backpack in heli
Near the chemical swamp, there's a spot for hiding loot in the helicopter graveyard.
Near the farm
Sorry, Vitka, but I'm low on supplies. I'm grabbing our loot. You'll get your share after our next hike.
Swamp
That watchtower was hit real hard! But it's an amazing spot, great for keeping my spoils.
Panel board
Time to grab what I've earned from the chumps of the Zone with blood, sweat and tears, hehe!
Doghouse
Saw a bandit searching some stalker's body. I'll keep my eye out for where he's going with his loot.
Crane cab
Damn it, not a moment of peace from those pieces of human garbage... Gotta throw away some of my stuff, I'm barely walking...
Hidden safe
Hehe, those bandits can't see shit. I'm walking around the vehicle graveyard and no one's even touching me. And there's a safe here, great place for my loot!
Box in bus
Whacked a couple of bandits. Got some stash coordinates off of one of 'em.
UAZ trunk
While I look for arties, I'll let my backpack sit nearby. Just hope the bandits don't show up, or that'll be the last I see of my stuff...
Mutated tree
Is there any place better than a pile of garbage under a deformed tree like this?
Crane
Found a kick-ass spot near the hangar. Hard to catch with the naked eye, and I have my guys nearby, so nobody's ever getting close to it.
Hangar safe
Freaking stalkers took over our hangar! I wonder if they cleared out the safe or not?
Backpack in wreckage
Hid my backpack in our base. If anyone actually finds it, I doubt they'll touch it.
Muscle man's stash
We had this one guy... dead at this point. Anyway, on a dare, he flung an entire pipe onto the roof of the hangar shop room, and I hid my loot inside. Those were the days...
Stash in vent
There's some ventilation thingy linked to the hangar. Should be a good place for my stuff.
Swamp log
Caught sight of some stalkers. One of them hid something in a log. I'll get there soon enough and clean it out real good for 'em.
Dead man's stash
Nobody's gonna believe how much stuff I loaded up on the other day! Man... problem is, if I take it over to my boys, they'll grab it all in a flash. Nah, I better hide it somewhere.
By the hangar
I found a backpack in the woods. Good find, to say the least: it's got weapons and medical supplies. Judging by the latter, the owner couldn't have been an ordinary stalker.
Anomalous stash
I was walking around anomalies looking for artifacts and found a little spot for hiding stuff just in case.
Garbage pile
That's some damn strong radiation in the trash. Doubt anyone's gonna look for my stuff there.
Hideaway in panel board
Man, I swear, these catacombs are something else! You could hide anything here: food, guns, ammo, even a body... oh wait.
Dead man's stuff
The SOB bandits popped a stalker... Good thing they didn't clean him out entirely — the rest is mine.
Soda water
It's amazing what you can find in these catacombs. Stumbled onto some Soviet-era water vending machines, should serve as a good place for hiding some stuff.
Stolen backpack
Hehe, haven't had a laugh like that in ages... The dumbass left his backpack when he went into an anomaly and forgot to get it back! What's yours is now mine!
Checkpoint box
Sanya, I hid your stuff by the hangar at the checkpoint, 'cause I don't trust our guys. Once you get better, pick it up, but don't take too long.
Hanging backpack
Decided to joke with our joker and hide his backpack in the tree. Try finding it now.
Chrome's stash
Stalker Chrome's stash. Contents are unknown.
Remnants of the past
I'll just hide this stuff inside the anomalous cistern. After having to close up shop, it'd be a shame to leave my stuff in an undependable place.
